dmca.title: Google DMCA Complaint - Jan Arps Traders Toolbox
dmca.body:
Dear Sir/Madam:

I hereby request that you disable access to the following infringing materials.

	1.	The copyrighted works that are protected are the Hawkeye Indicators, Jan Arps Crown Jewels, and Arps Swing/Day Trader's Tool Kit.
	2.	Google	provides access to illegal and copyrighted materials on the following pages:
a.	Search Query: Jan Arps Trading Indicators 
   i.	  http://www.yourtrader.org/
	ii.	http://www.tradesys.co.uk/downloads.htm
b. Search Query: Hawkeye Indicators
http://wvvw.yourtrader.biz/hawkeye.html http://www. yourtradar.biz/mdelta. html
iii.		http://www yourtrader.biz/mdelta.html
iv.		http://wwwyourtrader .org/hawkeyehtml
v.		http://www.yourtrader.org/
vi.		http://wwwyourtrader.org/hawkeyeindicators.html
c. Search Query: Jan Arps
i.		http://www.yourtrader.org/crownesignal.html
ii.		http:/www.yourtrader.org.ora/sigm.htl
iii.		http://www.yourtrader.org/crownesignal.html

	3.	Please contact us via e-mail to [private]@nigelhawkes.com or gmercer@janarps.com.
	4.	In Attachment A of this document is a list of the infringing material, website pages, and website owner.
 
Jan Arps' Traders' Toolbox has been in business since 1992. We did not authorize any of these sites to use, copy, or sale these products.
6.	 The Hawkeye Indicators, Arps Crown Jewels, Arps Swing Trader's Tool Kit, and the Arps Hurst Polynomial Regression Channels are protected by copyright notices on our own site, within the documentation, within the code, and on the authorized eSignal site.
7.	 I have a good faith belief that the use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages are not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.
8.	 I swear under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code, Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
Sincerely,

[private] Administrator
Jan Arps' Traders' Toolbox, LLC
 
Attachment A Protected Copyrighted Material:

	1.	www.yourtrader.org
